body:
No need for the blank line, and you can also do:
`return checkSelfPermission(PERMISSION_CAMERA) != PackageManager.PERMISSION_DENIED && checkSelfPermission(PERMISSION_STORAGE) != PackageManager.PERMISSION_DENIED;`
to remove the branching here.
body_html:
No need for the blank line, and you can also do:
return checkSelfPermission(PERMISSION_CAMERA) != PackageManager.PERMISSION_DENIED && checkSelfPermission(PERMISSION_STORAGE) != PackageManager.PERMISSION_DENIED;
to remove the branching here.
